item.title: MiClip 1.3 Installation
item.description: MiClip is a CLIP-seq data peak calling algorithm implemented in R but currently it doesn’t show up in the CRAN but you can obtain it from the archive and install from the source or tar.gz file. Download the tar.gz file: wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/MiClip/MiClip_1.3.tar.gz Start R: R Install dependencies: install.packages("moments") install.packages("VGAM") Finally install MiClip 1.3: install.packages("MiClip_1.3.tar.gz", repos = NULL, type="source") Then you can test it by loading the package and viewing its help file.
